name: orchestkit
description: Modular AI Development Toolkit — Install only what you need

plugins.name: ork
plugins.description: Full OrchestKit toolkit — 164 skills, 34 agents, 144 hooks. Complete AI development powerhouse with Memory Fabric, progressive loading, and production patterns.

plugins.name: ork-core
plugins.description: Core OrchestKit foundation — essential skills, agents, and hooks. Required for all other OrchestKit plugins.

plugins.name: ork-context
plugins.description: Context window management and engineering — compression, context optimization, system design interrogation

plugins.name: ork-memory
plugins.description: Cross-session memory and knowledge graph — Mem0 integration, memory fabric, sync patterns

plugins.name: ork-rag
plugins.description: RAG & Retrieval patterns — rag-retrieval, embeddings, contextual-retrieval, hyde-retrieval, reranking-patterns, query-decomposition

plugins.name: ork-rag-advanced
plugins.description: Advanced RAG patterns — agentic-rag-patterns, multimodal-rag, pgvector-search, semantic-caching

plugins.name: ork-langgraph-core
plugins.description: LangGraph Core patterns — state, routing, parallel, checkpoints, functional, supervisor

plugins.name: ork-langgraph-advanced
plugins.description: LangGraph Advanced patterns — human-in-loop, multi-agent-orchestration, agent-loops, alternative-agent-frameworks, temporal-io

plugins.name: ork-llm-core
plugins.description: Core LLM patterns — function-calling, prompt-engineering-suite, llm-streaming, llm-testing, llm-safety-patterns, prompt-caching

plugins.name: ork-llm-advanced
plugins.description: Advanced LLM patterns — fine-tuning-customization, vision-language-models, audio-language-models, high-performance-inference, ollama-local

plugins.name: ork-ai-observability
plugins.description: AI Observability — langfuse-observability, cache-cost-tracking, semantic-caching, llm-evaluation, evidence-verification

plugins.name: ork-data-engineering
plugins.description: Data Engineering — pgvector-search, test-data-management, embeddings, database-schema-designer, database-versioning, zero-downtime-migration

plugins.name: ork-evaluation

plugins.name: ork-product

plugins.name: ork-fastapi

plugins.name: ork-database
